reviewText: Where's Jacqueline? Of the four movies in this set Jacqueline Lovell, a.k.a. Sara St James, is in only one - "The Erotic House of Wax". She is nowhere to be found in the other three!  "The Erotic House of Wax" is for the most your typical 'B' movie fare: College girl inherits financially decrepit house of wax from her weird grandfather. Girl and her friends, with unexpected help of a mute mystical woman with magical amulets possessing powers of lust brings 'erotic' wax figures to life. Well, you can probably figure out the rest.  All said, "The Erotic House of Wax" is the only movie in this set worth having. The other three leave much to be desired - In fact, I wound up fast-forwarding through them!
